settings.title: BB Cigarettes Product Variants
settings.desc: Three distinct options crafted for different preferences

products.label: Classic Choice
products.name: BB Full Flavor
products.desc: The flagship BB Full Flavour Cigarettes deliver the complete premium smoking experience. Built for smokers who appreciate bold, uncompromised tobacco character.
products.specs:
• Flavor Profile: Bold, robust, full-bodied
  • Intensity: Full strength
  • Ideal For: Experienced smokers seeking rich, satisfying taste

products.label: Refined Balance
products.name: BB Lights Cigarettes
products.desc: BB Lights Cigarettes offer a lighter smoking experience without sacrificing flavor integrity. The same quality tobacco with a gentler approach.
products.specs:
• Flavor Profile: Smooth, mellow, balanced
  • Intensity: Reduced strength
  • Ideal For: Smokers preferring subtle, refined taste

products.label: Cool Refresh
products.name: BB Menthol Cigarettes
products.desc: BB Menthol Cigarettes feature a distinctively minty flavour that combines cooling sensation with premium tobacco quality for a refreshing experience.
products.specs:
• Flavor Profile: Cool, minty, refreshing
  • Intensity: Medium strength with cooling
  • Ideal For: Those seeking menthol freshness with quality tobacco
